sentences.en: Clergy and laity alike are divided in their views.
sentences.cn: 神职人员和信众同样都观点各异。

sentences.en: Employing to suspect, but also use the suspect; Laity both; Deadhead not; Different people must use.
sentences.cn: 用人要疑, 疑人要用; 俗人可用可不用; 庸人不可用; 异人要大用.

sentences.en: LaiTy: Hi , bGkc, I have a qummn for you.
sentences.cn: 拉里: 迈克, 你好, 我有个问题想问你.

sentences.en: Monks, however, do not normally perform sacramental rituals for the laity, and would not normally officiate at baptisms and marriages.
sentences.cn: 不过，僧侣并不为在俗教徒施行圣礼，也没有主持洗礼或婚礼的惯例。

sentences.en: The Church and the laity were increasingly active in charity work.
sentences.cn: 教会与俗众越来越积极参与慈善工作。

sentences.en: The clergy joined hands with the laity in maintaining the inherited verse forms.
sentences.cn: 僧侣们在维护继承下来的韵文格式方面同凡人联合在一起.

sentences.en: The new proposals affect both clergy and laity.
sentences.cn: 新的建议与神职人员和俗人都有关系.

sentences.en: These words do not speak with the Laity, Laity listened to a monk.
sentences.cn: 此话不与俗人讲, 俗人听了要出家.

sentences.en: Thus, his preaching was directed at not only the laity, but the clergy as well.
sentences.cn: 因此，他的讲道面向的不只是世俗之人，也面向神职人员。
我们的爱恋切莫向俗人显示.

sentences.en: To tell the laity our love.
sentences.cn: 如果对俗子讲我们的爱情.

sentences.en: WE BELIEVE in the priesthood all believers, and the parity of the ministers and the laity.
sentences.cn: 信徒皆为祭司, 受职者与平信徒同心服事.

trans.tran_cn: 俗人，普通信徒，门外汉，外行
